name: scrollstory
description: A jQuery plugin for building simple, scroll-based pages and interactions.

scripts.clean: mkdir -p build && rm -rf build/* && mkdir -p build/js && mkdir -p build/css
scripts.docs:html: npm run clean:docshtml && node bin/buildIndex.js > build/index.html && cp documentation/*.html build/
scripts.docs:css: npm run clean:docscss && cp -R documentation/css build && postcss --use autoprefixer --autoprefixer.browsers '> 5%' -d build/css/ build/css/base-*
scripts.docs:js: npm run clean:docsjs && cp -R documentation/js build && cp jquery.scrollstory.js build/js
scripts.watch:docscss: nodemon -e css --ignore build/ --ignore node_modules -x 'npm run docs:css'
scripts.watch:docsjs: nodemon -e js --ignore build/ --ignore node_modules --ignore dist -x 'npm run docs:js'
scripts.watch:docshtml: nodemon -e html,json,md --ignore build/ --ignore node_modules -x 'npm run docs:html'
scripts.build: npm run docs:html && npm run docs:css && npm run docs:js
scripts.dist: npm run lint && npm run build && currentdate=`date +%Y-%m-%d` && version=`grep '"version"' package.json | sed 's/[^0-9\.]//g'` && sed "s/VERSIONXXX/$version/g" jquery.scrollstory.js | sed "s/YYYY-MM-DDXXX/$currentdate/g" > dist/jquery.scrollstory.js && uglifyjs --comments -o dist/jquery.scrollstory.min.js dist/jquery.scrollstory.js
scripts.preserver: npm run clean && npm run build
